title: SpaceXâ€™s IPO will make space investment far less niche
summary: The article discusses the evolving landscape of space investing, highlighting the potential impact of a SpaceX IPO on the industry. It notes that space is increasingly seen as critical infrastructure, with investments broadening geographically. Avio is mentioned as one of the non-U.S. companies returning to an index due to growing investor engagement, but no concrete deal involving Avio is described.
